summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Continental Academy education platform. Backend APIs fully functional (100% success rate). Frontend mostly working with excellent design and responsiveness, but admin panel routing issue prevents CMS access.

ui_bugs.issue: Admin panel redirects to home page instead of loading admin interface
Subject field selector not found with Bosnian placeholder

integration_issues.issue: Admin login successful but panel doesn't load - routing issue

design_issues.issue: Pricing plans not displaying - no pricing elements found

passed_tests: Home page loads with all sections
action_item_for_main_agent: Fix admin panel routing issue - admin login works but /admin route redirects to home instead of loading AdminPage component. Also fix contact form subject field selector and ensure pricing plans display correctly.
